Sql.CDATA: Create or Alter View dbo.LUMHRApprovalV as select ph.CompanyID, 'PH' DataType, ph.CutoffDate, ph.BranchID, ph.EmployeeID, ph.WorkingDate Date, ph.EarningType Type, ph.Hour, v.Amount, IsNull(ph.Approved,0) Approved, ph.Remark from LUMPayrollHour ph inner join VHRPayroll v on ph.CompanyID = v.CompanyID and ph.WorkingDate = v.WorkingDate and ph.BranchID = v.BranchID and ph.EmployeeID = v.EmployeeID and ph.EarningType = v.Type UNION ALL Select pa.CompanyID, 'PA' DataType, pa.CutoffDate, pa.BranchID, pa.EmployeeID, pa.AdjustmentDate Date, pa.AdjustmentType Type, null Hour, pa.Amount, IsNull(pa.Approved,0) Approved, pa.Remark From LUMPayrollAdjustment pa
